Name: Yu Crossing Animals
About the game: Yu's got a new job - working as a mayor's assistant in a small town. Her task is to meet everyone and help the furry inhabitants with their everyday problems. She quickly discovers that in this town, people have a very special way of making friends... This is a short, linear erotic adventure game where you can explore a small town. It contains a mini-game and you can visit houses and talk to people. Collect, use and combine items in order to fulfill their needs and unlock new interactions. There are 6 different lewd scenes (plus a bonus pool scene) and 2 hidden sketches to discover. NEW FEATURES -Steam Achievements -Full voice work for Yu by @DornVa -New Branding -Still FREE! All characters in Yu Crossing Animals are 18+
